name: Capumon Demo
description:
Entry for 7th Kajam Game Jam. Theme: 1966.

So, I googled "Games" and "1966" and made a vow to emulate the first game that popped up.

That game was Pokemon Red.

While initially freaked out, I decided not to go against my word (even though I hadn't publicly announced anything) and looked forward to the technical challenge of emulating one of the most influential games of our generation (no pressure!)

Please enjoy what I have made, and remember that this is more an example of technical work than polish. :)
